StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPersonEmailByProspectId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProspectID xml AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
IF @ProspectID IS NOT null BEGIN DECLARE @ProspectsTable TABLE (ID uniqueidentifier) INSERT INTO @ProspectsTable (ID) SELECT ParamValues.ID.value('.','VARCHAR(36)') FROM @ProspectID.nodes('/Prospects/id') as ParamValues(ID) END
SELECT PE.PersonEmailId, PE.PersonId, PE.PersonEmailTypeId, PE.EmailAddress, PE.LastUpdateUserId FROM [usmc].[PersonEmail] PE INNER JOIN [usmc].[Prospect] PR ON PE.PersonId=PR.PersonId WHERE PR.ProspectId in ( SELECT * FROM @ProspectsTable ) AND PR.Suppression='False'
END
